languages.text: {n}Смазанная вспышка движения — и между готовыми сцепиться дознавателем и друкари возникает Ирлиэт, бледная от страха — и гнева.{/n} "Достаточно! Ненависть ослепила вас — и это тогда, когда Комморра вот-вот выпустит нас из своих когтей? Маражай, закрой свой неуемный рот и отступись. А ты..." {n}Эльдарка обращает взгляд на Хейнрикса, ее голос становится недоумевающим.{/n} "...ты правда жаждешь лишить ту, что заставляет твое сердце колотиться быстрее, шанса спастись, умерев самому или убив ее союзников в бегстве? Этого ты хочешь?"

{n}After a blurred flash of movement, Yrliet appears between the feuding Heinrix and Marazhai, pale with fear and anger.{/n} "Enough! Hate has blinded you when Commorragh is about to let us out of its clutches. Marazhai, still your intractable tongue and stand down. And you..." {n}She looks at Heinrix in apparent bewilderment.{/n} "Do you really want to deny the one who makes your heart beat faster a chance at survival by dying or killing her allies as she escapes? Is that what you want?"
languages.original_text: {n}Смазанная вспышка движения — и между готовыми сцепиться дознавателем и друкари возникает Ирлиэт, бледная от страха — и гнева.{/n} "Достаточно! Ненависть ослепила вас — и это тогда, когда Комморра вот-вот выпустит нас из своих когтей? Маражай, закрой свой неуемный рот и отступись. А ты..." {n}Эльдарка обращает взгляд на Хейнрикса, ее голос становится недоумевающим.{/n} "...ты правда жаждешь лишить ту, что заставляет твое сердце колотиться быстрее, шанса спастись, умерев самому или убив ее союзников в бегстве? Этого ты хочешь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A blurred flash of movement, and Yrliet appears between Heinrix and Marazhai, pale with fear and anger.{/n} "Enough! Hate has blinded you when Commorragh is about to let us out of its clutches. Marazhai, shut your big mouth and stand down. And you..." {n}She looks at Heinrix in apparent bewilderment.{/n} "...do you really want to deny the one that makes your heart beat faster the chance of survival by dying or killing her allies as she escapes? Is that what you want?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

Hate has blinded you when Commorragh is about to let us out of its clutches. Marazhai, still your intractable tongue and stand down. Hate has blinded you when Commorragh is about to let us out of its clutches. Marazhai, still your intractable tongue and stand down. And you..." {n}She looks at Heinrix in apparent bewilderment.{/n} "Do you really want to deny the one who makes your heart beat faster a chance at survival by dying or killing her allies as she escapes? Is that what you want?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se rue entre Heinrix et Marazhai, pâle de frayeur et de rage.{/n} « Assez ! La haine vous aveugle alors que nous sommes enfin en train de nous libérer de l'emprise de Commorragh. Marazhai, faites taire votre langue perfide et reculez. Quant à vous... » {n}Elle adresse un regard perplexe à Heinrix.{/n} « Voulez-vous vraiment réduire drastiquement les chances de survie de celle qui accélère les battements de votre cœur, en mourant ou en tuant ses alliés alors qu'elle tente de s'enfuir ? Est-ce là ce que vous désirez ? »
languages.original_text: {n}After a blurred flash of movement, Yrliet appears between the feuding Heinrix and Marazhai, pale with fear and anger.{/n} "Enough! Hate has blinded you when Commorragh is about to let us out of its clutches. Marazhai, still your intractable tongue and stand down. And you..." {n}She looks at Heinrix in apparent bewilderment.{/n} "Do you really want to deny the one who makes your heart beat faster a chance at survival by dying or killing her allies as she escapes? Is that what you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se rue entre Heinrix et Marazhai, pâle de frayeur et de rage.{/n} « Assez ! La haine vous aveugle alors que nous sommes enfin en train de nous libérer de l'emprise de Commorragh. Marazhai, fermez votre grande bouche et reculez. Et vous... » {n}Elle adresse un regard perplexe à Heinrix.{/n} « Voulez-vous vraiment réduire drastiquement les chances de survie de celle qui accélère les battements de votre cœur, en mourant ou en tuant ses alliés alors qu'elle tente de s'enfuir ? Est-ce là ce que vous voulez ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}一阵模糊的光芒闪过，伊莉耶特突然挡在了剑拔弩张的海因里希与玛拉斋之间。她脸色惨白，脸上满是恐惧与愤怒。{/n}“够了！我们打算逃出科摩罗，可仇恨却蒙蔽了你们的双眼。玛拉斋，管好你那条不听话的舌头，退后。还有你……”{n}她看着海因里希，显然非常困惑。{/n}“每当你看到她的时候，你都会心跳加速。你真的打算在这种时候害死自己，或是杀害她的盟友，害得她被困在这种鬼地方吗？你真的打算这样做吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}After a blurred flash of movement, Yrliet appears between the feuding Heinrix and Marazhai, pale with fear and anger.{/n} "Enough! Hate has blinded you when Commorragh is about to let us out of its clutches. Marazhai, still your intractable tongue and stand down. And you..." {n}She looks at Heinrix in apparent bewilderment.{/n} "Do you really want to deny the one who makes your heart beat faster a chance at survival by dying or killing her allies as she escapes? Is that what you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一阵模糊的光芒闪过，伊莉耶特突然挡在了剑拔弩张的海因里希与玛拉斋之间。她脸色惨白，脸上满是恐惧与愤怒。{/n}“够了！我们打算逃出科摩罗，可仇恨却蒙蔽了你们的双眼。玛拉斋，给我闭上你的大嘴巴，退后。还有你……”{n}她看着海因里希，显然非常困惑。{/n}“每当你看到她的时候，你都会心跳加速。你真的打算在这种时候害死自己，或是杀害她的盟友，害得她被困在这种鬼地方吗？你真的打算这样做吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ぼんやりとした閃光のような動きを追いながら、ユリエットが恐怖と怒りで青ざめた顔で、反目しあうハインリックスとマラズハイの間に飛び込んできた。{/n}「いい加減にしろ！コモラフが我らを解放しようとしているのに、2人とも憎しみで目が曇っているぞ。マラズハイ、その生意気な舌をつつしめ。そしてお前は…」{n}彼女は戸惑った様子でハインリックスを見た。{/n} 「お前の胸をときめかせる者が生き残るチャンスを、ふいにするつもりなのか？お前が死んだり、脱出時に彼女の味方を殺せばそうなるだろう。それでいいのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}After a blurred flash of movement, Yrliet appears between the feuding Heinrix and Marazhai, pale with fear and anger.{/n} "Enough! Hate has blinded you when Commorragh is about to let us out of its clutches. Marazhai, still your intractable tongue and stand down. And you..." {n}She looks at Heinrix in apparent bewilderment.{/n} "Do you really want to deny the one who makes your heart beat faster a chance at survival by dying or killing her allies as she escapes? Is that what you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ぼんやりとした閃光のような動きを追いながら、ユリエットが恐怖と怒りで青ざめた顔で、反目しあうハインリックスとマラズハイの間に飛び込んできた。{/n}「いい加減にしろ！コモラフが我らを解放しようとしているのに、2人とも憎しみで目が曇っているぞ。マラズハイ、その生意気な舌をつつしめ。そしてお前は…」{n}彼女は戸惑った様子でハインリックスを見た。{/n} 「お前の胸をときめかせる者が生き残るチャンスを、ふいにするつもりなのか？お前が死んだり、脱出時に彼女の味方を殺せばそうなるだろう。それでいいのか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einer blitzschnellen, verschwommenen Bewegung steht Yrliet zwischen Heinrix und Marazhai, bleich vor Angst und Wut.{/n} "Genug! Ihr seid von Hass geblendet, obwohl wir kurz davor sind, uns aus Commorraghs Fängen zu befreien. Marazhai, hütet Eure spitze Zunge und tretet zurück. Und Ihr ..." {n}Sie blickt Heinrix offensichtlich entsetzt an.{/n} "Der Frau, die Euer Herz höher schlagen lässt, wollt Ihr also eine Chance auf Überleben versagen, indem Ihr während ihrer Flucht sterbt oder ihre Verbündeten tötet? Das wollt Ihr also?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a blurred flash of movement, Yrliet appears between the feuding Heinrix and Marazhai, pale with fear and anger.{/n} "Enough! Hate has blinded you when Commorragh is about to let us out of its clutches. Marazhai, still your intractable tongue and stand down. And you..." {n}She looks at Heinrix in apparent bewilderment.{/n} "Do you really want to deny the one who makes your heart beat faster a chance at survival by dying or killing her allies as she escapes? Is that what you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer blitzschnellen, verschwommenen Bewegung taucht Yrliet zwischen Heinrix und Marazhai auf, bleich vor Angst und Wut.{/n} "Genug! Ihr seid von Hass geblendet, obwohl wir kurz davor sind, uns aus Commorraghs Fängen zu befreien. Marazhai, haltet Eure Klappe und tretet weg. Und Ihr ..." {n}Sie blickt Heinrix offensichtlich entsetzt an.{/n} "Derjenigen, die Euer Herz höher schlagen lässt, wollt Ihr also eine Chance auf Überleben versagen, indem Ihr während ihrer Flucht sterbt oder ihre Verbündeten tötet? Das wollt Ihr also?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Con una rapidez fulgurante, Yrliet se interpone entre Heinrix y Marazhai, lívida de miedo y furia.{/n} «¡Ya basta! Os dejáis cegar por el odio justo cuando Commorragh está a punto de dejarnos escapar de sus garras. Marazhai, contén esa lengua insoportable y contrólate. En cuanto a ti...». {n}Mira a Heinrix con evidente perplejidad.{/n} «¿De verdad piensas negar a la persona que acelera tu corazón una oportunidad de sobrevivir, muriendo o matando a sus aliados en plena fuga? ¿Es eso lo que quieres?».
languages.original_text: {n}After a blurred flash of movement, Yrliet appears between the feuding Heinrix and Marazhai, pale with fear and anger.{/n} "Enough! Hate has blinded you when Commorragh is about to let us out of its clutches. Marazhai, still your intractable tongue and stand down. And you..." {n}She looks at Heinrix in apparent bewilderment.{/n} "Do you really want to deny the one who makes your heart beat faster a chance at survival by dying or killing her allies as she escapes? Is that what you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Moviéndose con una rapidez fulgurante, Yrliet se interpone entre Heinrix y Marazhai, lívida de miedo y furia.{/n} «¡Ya basta! Os dejáis cegar por el odio justo cuando Commorragh está a punto de dejarnos escapar de sus garras. Marazhai, cierra esa bocaza tuya y contrólate. En cuanto a ti...». {n}Mira a Heinrix con evidente perplejidad.{/n} «¿De verdad piensas negar a la persona que acelera tu corazón una oportunidad de sobrevivir, muriendo o matando a sus aliados en plena fuga? ¿Es eso lo que quieres?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Korkudan ve öfkeden beti benzi atmış olan Yrliet, hızla harekete geçip kavgaya tutuşmak üzere olan Heinrix ile Marazhai'ın arasına giriyor.{/n} "Yeter! Tam Commorragh'tan kurtulmak üzereyiz dedik, nefretten gözünüz döndü! Marazhai, o inatçı diline hâkim ol ve kes sesini. Sana gelince..." {n}Yrliet, Heinrix'e hayrete düşmüşçesine bakıyor.{/n} "Kalbini küt küt attıran kadının yaşamasını istemiyor musun? Ölsen veya müttefiklerini öldürsen ona faydası olur mu? Bunu mu istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a blurred flash of movement, Yrliet appears between the feuding Heinrix and Marazhai, pale with fear and anger.{/n} "Enough! Hate has blinded you when Commorragh is about to let us out of its clutches. Marazhai, still your intractable tongue and stand down. And you..." {n}She looks at Heinrix in apparent bewilderment.{/n} "Do you really want to deny the one who makes your heart beat faster a chance at survival by dying or killing her allies as she escapes? Is that what you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet hızla harekete geçiyor ve kavga etmek üzere olan Heinrix ile Marazhai'ın arasına giriyor. Korkudan ve öfkeden Yrliet'in beti benzi atmış.{/n} "Yeter! Tam Commorragh'tan kurtulmak üzereyiz dedik, nefretten gözünüz dönmüş! Marazhai, o inatçı diline hâkim ol ve kes sesini. Sana gelince..." {n}Yrliet, Heinrix'e hayrete düşmüşçesine bakıyor.{/n} "Kalbinin hızlı atmasını sağlayan kadının sağ kalmasını istemiyor musun? Ölsen veya müttefiklerini öldürsen ona faydası olur mu? Bunu mu istiyorsun?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
